commentAnnotations.text: Janssen Research & Development is a global organization that operates through different legal entities in various countries. The term 'sponsor' represents these various legal entities.
All subjects will undergo QuantiFERON-TB Gold testing. In countries where not approved, TB skin testing is required (recommended but not required for Ukraine if tuberculin is unavailable).
commentAnnotations.sourceSection: Time and Events Schedule: Induction Study

commentAnnotations.text: Vital signs include temperature, pulse/heart rate, respiratory rate, and blood pressure.
The Bristol Stool Form Scale is a medical aid to classify the form (or consistency) of human feces into 7 categories.

Subjects have failed to respond to corticosteroids if they have had evidence of an initial inadequate response, recurrent disease, or a relapse despite receiving at least 0.75 mg/kg/day or â‰¥40 mg/day of prednisone for 2 weeks.

studyDefinitionDocumentVersions.description: Substantial amendment to address health authority feedback and move PK/Immunogenicity sampling points.
Substantial amendment to address health authority requests for additional data collection (Bristol Stool Form Scale) and clarify US-specific definitions of clinical remission.
